thread.title: This Popular Reel-Life Couple Is Coming Back Together In A Web Series
thread.title_full: This Popular Reel-Life Couple Is Coming Back Together In A Web Series

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: This Popular Reel-Life Couple Is Coming Back Together In A Web Series
text:
Sukriti Gumber Mar . 17 . 2017 Ram Kapoor, Sakshi Tanwar 
The famous duo, Ram Kapoor & Sakshi Tanwar , from Ekta Kapoor ‘s popular show, Bade Achhe Lagte Hai is coming back together – this time in a web series. Ram and Sakshi became instantly popular due to their warm and relatable chemistry in the show, and therefore the makers have planned to cast them opposite each other again. 
The show, Kar Le Tu Bhi Mohabbat, is the first one to be launched by Ekta’s Balaji ALT productions, who are also producing several other shows meant for the digital space. Ram plays a superstar in the series, who visits a counsellor (played by Sakshi) to sort out his problems. He is in a dysfunctional relationship with his wife and eventually gets attracted to the counsellor even though they have different personalities. The series is reportedly filled with double meaning jokes and deals with various adult issues as well. Check out the first look here: Here's the official poster of Karrle Tu Bhi Mohabbat, #ALTBalajiOriginal starring your favourite @RamKapoor and #SakshiTanwar ! Excited? pic.twitter.com/ISIBjtFwxB 
Are you excited to see them together again? Tell us in the comments below! 0
